author: johnydony
content:
Hello EF foundation. 
https://twitter.com/lifiprotocol/status/1505831327710416898?s=20&t=gvNqdvq8Q1bMXD5vA1xq4w

22th June is official for merge transition?

author: johnydony
content: I'm so doubtful if this sourcer know how to merge transition works.

author: paulhauner
content: If it is June 22, no one told me.

author: johnydony
content: Thank you for letting me know.

author: m.kalinin
content: There is no official date of the Merge yet. A rough date is somewhere in Jun-July

author: mrabino1
content: Thank you for this. Given the community anticipation of this upcoming historic event... while everything is and should always be subject to "when it is ready and safe" , I do believe adding another column on https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/paris.md. might help on the targeted date (as we have a lot of testnets to upgrade!)

author: mrabino1
content: many folks, including me, very much want to help (even in a small way for testing).. having some minimum guidance on timing directly helps us prepare any of the needed tooling.. thx.

author: m.kalinin
content: This is great! Then you should participate in https://kiln.themerge.dev, deploy as many smart contracts, dapps, services as you can and check all the crazy cases that comes to your mind ðŸ˜…

author: djrtwo
content:
also! contributing back can be huge

Writing a tutorial, filming a little video about getting something setup, improving documentation where it was lacking, etc

author: djrtwo
content: put on your open source contributor hat for any part of the stack. If it was difficult for you, then it might be for someone else! writing and tidying up things can go a long way

author: mrabino1
content: absolutely.. (and I do)..  pls dont take my above comments as negative criticism..  rather it is / was only intended to get some minimal guidance on when we expect to move on the next testnet..

author: djrtwo
content: ha! and don't think mine is negative either. I mean it very earnestly. Small testing and  contributions can go a really long way these next couple of months

author: gusto_m
content: A date for the Ethereum mainnet proof-of-stake transition has not been set as of the publication of this post. Any source claiming otherwise is likely to be a scam. Updates will be posted on this blog. Please stay safe!

author: holgerd77
content: We have our Kiln-ready releases out: https://twitter.com/EFJavaScript/status/1506632736165007367?t=Alm7CaJzuh8ZIxIE4Rssqw&s=19
